description: I am purple, yellow, red, and green the King cannot reach me and neither can the Queen. I show my colors after the rain and only when the sun comes out again.
It is blue and green, and red, It bounces higher than my head, It does not want to stop at all. What is it? It is my…
Clean, but not water, White, but not snow, Sweet, but not ice-cream, What is it?
I am always hungry, I must always be fed, The finger I touch, Will soon turn red.
I am round like an apple Flat as a chip I have eyes But I can’t see one bit.
What has a head like a cat, Feet like a cat, A tail like a cat,But isn't a cat?
Always runs but never walks, Often murmurs, never talks,Has a bed but never sleeps,Has a mouth but never eats?
I’m lighter than a feather, yet the strongest man can’t hold me for more than 5 minutes.
What gets wetter and wetter the more it dries?
AI fly, yet I have no wings. I cry, yet I have no eyes. Darkness follows me. Lower light I never see.
